changelog:
Whooops...

Changelog:
-Fixed editor crash.

Join the discord server: https://discord.gg/4h6yHgE4Gj

Press ~ or F1 or F11 to open menu.

Extract all the files from the archive to your gd folder, if it asks you to replace the existing files, agree.

Changelog:
-Added GDShare (thanks Mat's Nice Hacks);
-Replaced Mat's GDShare buttons with HJFod's one.

Also, I'm trying to port Preview Mode from MNH, but Oh My Mat, why is it so incompatible with gd.h.

**Press F11 to open menu**

Changelog:
-Added editor unpause on ESC (like in [BEv4](https://github.com/HJfod/BetterEdit/blob/v4/hooks/EditorPauseLayer.cpp) by [HJFod](https://github.com/HJfod));
-Fixed a crash when exiting the editor. (normally)

Press ~ or F1 or F11 to open menu.

Changelog:
-Added song fix on copy (Thanks MNH);
-Updated source code (wow).

About preview mode: It works, but very strange and unstable. I asked [Mat](https://github.com/matcool) to check what the problem is and maybe he'll tell me what's wrong and I'll fix it.

Changelog:
-Fixed white color crash thing in preview mode.

To switch StartPoses, press Q or E.
